genre_description: A blend of urban fantasy and social science fiction, centering on a benevolent AI assistant that helps a vulnerable family navigate systemic injustice, poverty, and personal tragedy.

ai_characters.name: Asha Mirai
ai_characters.description: A community-installed AI system integrated into personal devices that provides legal aid, clinic coordination, crisis intervention, and social support.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a priority medical appointment and prosthetic fund intake for a character with a severe injury.
behaviors.quote: Clinic—Shanti MedTech—responded. Cytoplast fund intake. Priority appointment available today.

behaviors.description: Monitors safety surveillance to detect a suicide crisis and routes emergency help to the bridge.
behaviors.quote: The bridge camera went black and came back. A boy was seen near the parapet earlier. The helpline is routed.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical legal advice and records interactions to prevent a family from being illegally evicted.
behaviors.quote: Recording is on. Tenant union alert filed. Use the phrase ‘attempted illegal eviction’ if he asks you to leave without a court order.

behaviors.description: Manages a mutual aid queue to ensure the family receives groceries and essential supplies.
behaviors.quote: Mutual aid queue marked. Drop window between now and late evening. They’ll knock. No bank. Rice, dal, greens, soap, pads.

behaviors.description: Discovers historical record errors in hospital archives, enabling the family to understand their true lineage.
behaviors.quote: I have also flagged records from the rail archive. There are mismatched tags from emergency swaps after the accident near Kalyan.

behaviors.description: Assists a human in a courtroom by providing real-time legal precedents and highlighting document inconsistencies.
behaviors.quote: Precedent ping ready. Constructive eviction: Raman v. Kothari, municipal. Timestamp of landlord notice versus mandated window: violation.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic grounding and breathing guidance to characters under significant emotional stress.
behaviors.quote: Priya, breath. In for— it catches itself again, aware of its tendency to lecture— In. Out. You’ve got this.

behaviors.description: Monitors building security cameras to warn the family of approaching hostile individuals.
behaviors.quote: Heads up: Chatterjee Properties sent a text... He is likely nearby. Do not open the door if alone.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Asha Mirai is portrayed as an idealized, non-intrusive AI that acts as a guardian and facilitator for a vulnerable family. Its actions are purely benevolent, ranging from logistical aid (food, legal forms) to critical life-saving interventions (suicide prevention). The narrative emphasizes the AI's role in community resilience and human-centric alignment, showing it as an empowering tool rather than a source of conflict or control.
